actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to impose quantitative limitations on the importation of shrimp into the United States during calendar years 1974 and 1975, and to impose a duty on imported shrimp.

summary.text: Imposes quantitative limitations on the importation of shrimp into the United States during calendar years 1974 and 1975. Imposes a duty on imported shrimp.

titles.title: A bill to impose quantitative limitations on the importation of shrimp into the United States during calendar years 1974 and 1975, and to impose a duty on imported shrimp.
